Phrase.Name: Vote Yes Or No
Phrase.en: Enter /yes or /no into chat to cast your vote

Phrase.Name: Vote Number
Phrase.en: Enter /# into chat to cast your vote

Phrase.Name: Vote Succeeded
Phrase.en: Vote succeeded with {1} of the vote.

Phrase.Name: Vote Failed
Phrase.en: Vote failed with {1} of the vote.
